emptyState.title: No leads yet
emptyState.description: Start building your sales pipeline by adding your first lead. Leads represent potential customers and are the first step in the sales process.
emptyState.helpText: Pro tip: Leads with complete contact information and clear source attribution convert to opportunities 3x faster.
suggestions: Import leads from CSV or Excel files
Capture leads from web forms and landing pages
Add leads manually from business cards or meetings
emptyState.noFiltersDescription: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters to find what you're looking for.
filterSuggestions: Broaden your search by removing some filters
Check for typos in your search query
Try searching by company name instead of contact name
